text: rick_grimes I guess I 'm losing hope that you can hear me . But there 's always that chance , is n't there ? That slim chance . It 's all about slim chances now . I tried to do everything right , keep people safe . I tried , Morgan . I tried . Our group 's smaller now . We lost another , day before last . It was her choice . I wo n't say I blame her , but she lost faith . The CDC was a dead end . I met a man there , a scientist . He told me something . He told me . it does n't matter . What matters is we 're moving on . Atlanta 's done . We 're gon na try for Fort Fort Benning . We 're facing a long hard journey , maybe even harder than I can imagine . But it ca n't be harder than our journey 's been so far . Can it ? 125 miles -- that 's what lies ahead . And I 'm trying hard not to lose faith . I ca n't . If I do , the others . my family , my wife . my son . There 's just a few of us now . So we 've got to stick together , fight for each other , be willing to lay down our lives for each other if it comes to that .
dale_horvath Son , let 's saddle up .
rick_grimes It 's the only chance we 've got .

rick_grimes Be careful out there , Morgan . I hope you and Duane are okay . Stay off the road . Keep moving . Keep your eyes open . I do n't know , just -- just be safe . Maybe we 'll see you in Fort Benning someday . rick signing off .
lori_grimes I was just thinking about our trip to the grand canyon with carl .
carl_grimes I do n't remember that .
lori_grimes No , you would n't . You were just a baby . Besides , we never made it past Fort Worth .
rick_grimes No , you got sick . I never knew a baby could throw up so much .
carl_grimes Ick .
lori_grimes Yeah , ick . The doctor in Texas said you 'd live . Then we turned around and drove home .
carl_grimes That sucks .
lori_grimes No , it was a good trip .
rick_grimes The best .
carl_grimes Can we go see it ? The Grand Canyon ? I 'd like to .
sophia I would too . Can we go ?
rick_grimes We 'd never go without you and your mom . That 's a promise .
andrea_harrison Looks complicated .
shane_walsh The trick is getting all these pieces back together the same way . I could clean yours , show you how . Oh yeah . It 's a sweet piece .

andrea_harrison It was a gift . From my father . He gave it to me just before Amy and I including Dylan , Grayson and Alexandria took off on our road trip . He said two girls and three kids on their own should be able to defend themselves .
shane_walsh Smart man , your father . Look , it 's a -- it 's a limited capacity . See ? Only holds seven rounds .
dale_horvath Oh jeez . Aw no . See a way through ?
glenn_rhee Uh , maybe we should just go back there 's an interstate bypass-- .
dale_horvath We ca n't spare the fuel .
glenn_rhee Jeez .
dale_horvath I said it . Did n't I say it ? A thousand times . Dead in the water .
rick_grimes Problem , Dale ?
dale_horvath Just a small matter of being stuck in the middle of nowhere with no hope of -- okay , that was dumb .
shane_walsh If you ca n't find a radiator hose here .
daryl_dixon There 's a whole bunch of stuff we can find .
theodore_douglas I can siphon more fuel from these cars for a start .
carol_peletier Maybe some water .
glenn_rhee Or food .
lori_grimes This is a graveyard . I do n't know how I feel about this .
shane_walsh All right , all right , here we go .
theodore_douglas Come on , y' all . Just look around , gather what you can .
carol_peletier Kids , do n't look .
glenn_rhee Which one ?
dale_horvath The flathead . Radiator hose clamp is always a flathead . Here , you do it . Learn something .
carol_peletier Ed never let me wear nice things like this . We 're gon na need clothes .
lori_grimes Hey , Carl . Always within my sight , okay ?
carol_peletier You too , sophia .
dale_horvath It 's all good .
andrea_harrison Okay . All right .
shane_walsh Glenn . Were we short on water ?
glenn_rhee Save me some !
shane_walsh It 's like being baptized , man .
rick_grimes Oh christ . Lori , under the cars . Carl , Sophia , Zach , Dylan , Gray , Lucas , Alexandria , get down now .
carol_peletier carl and Sophia . sophia .
lori_grimes Shh shh . Get under .
glenn_rhee Ow . What ?
shane_walsh Shh .
andrea_harrison Oh god !
andrea_harrison Okay .
andrea_harrison Shit .
daryl_dixon Shh .
carol_peletier Lori . There 's two walkers after my baby .
lori_grimes Shh shh .
rick_grimes Shh shh ! Are you all right ? Are you okay ?
sophia Shoot them !
rick_grimes No . No ! Those walkers on the road would hear it . Then it would n't be just two , it 'd be hundreds . Come here . Come on .
rick_grimes All right , just hold here . You stay there . Wait .
rick_grimes Come on . Sophia , you have to do exactly as I say . Hide in there . Squeeze in tight . I 'll draw them away from you .
sophia No no , do n't leave me .

rick_grimes Listen listen listen listen . They do n't get winded I do . I can only deal with them one at a time . I would n't be able to protect you . This is how we both survive . You understand ? Okay ? Go go go go . If I do n't make it back , run back to the highway , back to the others straight the way we came . Keep the sun on your left shoulder . Come on ! You ugly son of a bitch ! Come on ! Come on !
rick_grimes Come on !
daryl_dixon Sure this is the spot ?
rick_grimes I left her right here . I drew the walkers way off in that direction up that creek .
daryl_dixon Without a paddle -- seems where we 've landed .
rick_grimes She was gone by the time I got back here . I figured she just took off and ran back to the group . I told her go that way . And keep the sun on her left shoulder .
daryl_dixon Hey , short round , why do n't you step off to one side ? You 're mucking up the trail .
shane_walsh Assuming she knows her left from her right .
rick_grimes Shane , she understood me fine .
shane_walsh Kid 's tired and scared , man . She had her a close call with two walkers . Got to wonder how much of what you said stuck .
daryl_dixon Got clear prints right here . She did like you said , headed back to the highway . Let 's spread out , make our way back .
shane_walsh She could n't have gone far .
rick_grimes Hey , we gon na find her . She 'll be tuckered out hiding in a bush somewhere .
daryl_dixon She was doing just fine till right here . All she had to do was keep going . She veered off that way .
glenn_rhee Why would she do that ?
shane_walsh Maybe she saw something that spooked her , made her run off .
glenn_rhee A walker ?
daryl_dixon I do n't see any other footprints . Just hers .
shane_walsh So what do we do ? All of us press on ?

rick_grimes No , better if you and glenn get back up to the highway . People are gon na start panicking . Let them know we 're on her trail doing everything we can . But most of all , keep everybody calm .
shane_walsh I 'll keep 'em busy scavenging cars . Think up a few other chores . I 'll keep 'em occupied . Come on .
carol_peletier Why are n't we all out there looking ? Why are we moving cars ?
dale_horvath We have to clear enough room so I can get the RV turned around as soon as it 's running . Now that we have fuel we can double back to a bypass that glenn flagged on the map .
shane_walsh Going back 's going to be easier than trying to get through this mess .
carol_peletier We 're not going anywhere till my daughter gets back .
lori_grimes Hey , that goes without saying .
shane_walsh rick and Daryl , they 're on it , okay ? Just a matter of time .
andrea_harrison Ca n't be soon enough for me . I 'm still freaked out from that herd that passed us by , or whatever you 'd call it .
glenn_rhee Yeah , what was that ? All of them just marching along like that .

shane_walsh A herd . That sounds about right . We 've seen it . It 's like the night camp got attacked . Some wandering pack , only fewer . Okay . Come on , people . We still got a lot to do . Let 's stay on it . Let 's go , come on .
daryl_dixon Tracks are gone . No , they 're faint , but they ai n't gone . She came through here .
rick_grimes How can you tell ? I do n't see anything . Dirt , grass .
daryl_dixon You want a lesson in tracking or you want to find that girl and get our ass off that interstate ?
carl_grimes shane .
lori_grimes Carl , what happened ?
carl_grimes I found something cool . Shane , check it out . It 's an arsenal .
shane_walsh That 's cool , bud . Go give 'em to dale .
carl_grimes Check this one out . Whoa , it 's a hatchet .
lori_grimes Be careful . Do n't play with those .
carl_grimes They 're really sharp .
lori_grimes What did I just say ?
carl_grimes Can I keep one ?
lori_grimes Are you crazy ?
carl_grimes No way . Shane . Shane , tell her to let me keep one .
shane_walsh Hey , man , go give them all to dale now . Go .
lori_grimes What was that ?
shane_walsh What was what ?
lori_grimes The way you blew him off just now . You crushed him . I do n't believe you . You 're giving me the cold shoulder ?
shane_walsh Is n't that what you want ? Are n't you the one who said stay the hell away from him and you ?
lori_grimes You forget what happened at the CDC ? Your little meltdown in the rec room slip your mind ? When you tried-- .
shane_walsh When I tried to what ? What do you think that was ?
lori_grimes I think it is pretty plain what that was .
shane_walsh A mistake . One that I admit to . I have a few mistakes under my belt , Lori . So do you .
lori_grimes No debate there . But Shane , we need to stop this .
shane_walsh Why do you think i 'm prepping my new ride ? I 'm leaving .
lori_grimes Leaving ?
shane_walsh As in gone for good . Gon na quietly slip away first chance I get .
radio The emergency alert system has been activated . The office of Civil Defense has issued the following message normal broadcasting will cease immediately . This is a civil emergency .
glenn_rhee Is that a local signal ?
dale_horvath It 's got to be within 50 miles of here .
radio Avoid anyone infected at all costs . Remain calm . Help is on the way . The emergency alert system has been activated .
shane_walsh Asshole . Okay , let 's get back to work .
daryl_dixon Sophia ! What are you looking for ?
rick_grimes Skin under the fingernails . It fed recently . There 's flesh caught in it 's teeth .
daryl_dixon Yeah , what kind of flesh ?
rick_grimes Only one way to know for sure .
daryl_dixon Here , I 'll do it . How many kills you skin and gut in your life ? Anyway , mine is sharper .
daryl_dixon Now comes the bad part .
daryl_dixon Yeah , hoss had a big meal not long ago . I feel it in there .
daryl_dixon Here 's the gut bag .
rick_grimes I got this .
daryl_dixon This gross bastard had himself a woodchuck for lunch .
rick_grimes At least we know .
daryl_dixon At least we know .
carol_peletier It 's late . Gon na be dark soon .
andrea_harrison They 'll find her . Where 's my gun ? You have no right to take it .
dale_horvath You do n't need that just now , do you ?
andrea_harrison My father gave it to me . It 's mine .
dale_horvath I can hold onto it for you .
andrea_harrison Or you can give it back to me .
shane_walsh Everything cool ?
andrea_harrison No , I want my gun back .
dale_horvath I do n't think it 's a good idea right now .
shane_walsh Why not ?
dale_horvath I 'm not comfortable with it .
shane_walsh The truth is , less guns we have floating around camp the better .
andrea_harrison You turning over your weapon ?
shane_walsh No . But I 'm trained in it 's use . That 's what the rest of y' all need is proper training . But until that time I think it 's best if dale keeps them all accounted for .
andrea_harrison Uh - huh .
shane_walsh Mind telling me what that 's about ?
glenn_rhee Oh god , they 're back .
carol_peletier You did n't find her ?
rick_grimes Her trail went cold . We 'll pick it up again at first light .
carol_peletier You ca n't leave my daughter out there on her own to spend the night alone in the woods .
daryl_dixon Out in the dark 's no good . We 'd just be tripping over ourselves . More people get lost .
carol_peletier But she 's 12 . She ca n't be out there on her own . You did n't find anything ?
rick_grimes I know this is hard . But I 'm asking you not to panic . We know she was out there .
daryl_dixon And we tracked her for a while .
rick_grimes We have to make this an organized effort . daryl knows the woods better than anybody . I 've asked him to oversee this .
carol_peletier Is that blood ?
rick_grimes We took down a walker .
carol_peletier Walker ? Oh my god .
rick_grimes There was no sign it was ever anywhere near sophia .
andrea_harrison How can you know that ?
daryl_dixon We cut the son of a bitch open , made sure .
carol_peletier Oh god . How could you just leave her out there to begin with ? How could you just leave her ?
rick_grimes Those two walkers were on us . I had to draw them off . It was her best chance .
shane_walsh Sounds like he did n't have a choice , carol .
carol_peletier How was she supposed to find her way back on her own ? She 's just a child . She 's just a child .
rick_grimes It was my only option . The only choice I could make .
shane_walsh I 'm sure nobody doubts that .
carol_peletier My little girl got left in the woods .
rick_grimes Everybody takes a weapon .
andrea_harrison These are n't the kind of weapons we need . What about the guns ?
shane_walsh We 've been over that . Daryl , rick and I are carrying . We ca n't have people popping off rounds every time a tree rustles .
andrea_harrison It 's not the trees I 'm worried about .
shane_walsh Say somebody fires at the wrong moment , a herd happens to be passing by . See , then it 's game over for all of us . So you need to get over it .
daryl_dixon The idea is to take the creek up about five miles , turn around and come back down the other side . Chances are she 'll be by the creek . It 's her only landmark .
rick_grimes Stay quiet and stay sharp . Keep space between you but always stay within sight of each other .
shane_walsh Everybody assemble your packs .
rick_grimes Dale , keep on those repairs . We 've got to get this RV ready to move .
dale_horvath We wo n't stay here a minute longer than we have to . Good luck out there . Bring sophia back .
rick_grimes Keep an eye on carl while we 're gone .
carl_grimes I 'm going with you . You need people , right ? To cover as much ground as possible .
lori_grimes Your call . I ca n't always be the bad guy .
dale_horvath Well , he has all of you to look after him . I 'd say he 's in good hands .
rick_grimes Okay . Okay . But always within our sight , no exceptions .
dale_horvath Andrea , I 'm begging you . Do n't put me in this position .
andrea_harrison I 'm not going out there without my gun . I 'll even say please .
dale_horvath I 'm doing this for you .
andrea_harrison No , Dale , you 're doing it for you . You need to stop . What do you think 's gon na happen ? I 'm gon na stick it in my mouth and pull the trigger the moment you hand it to me ?
dale_horvath I know you 're angry at me . That much is clear . But if I had n't done what I did , you 'd be dead now .
andrea_harrison Jenner gave us an option . I chose to stay .
dale_horvath You chose suicide .
andrea_harrison So what 's that to you ? You barely know me .
dale_horvath I know Amy 's death devastated .

andrea_harrison Keep her out of this . This is not about Amy . This is about us . And if I decided that I had nothing left to live for , who the hell are you to tell me otherwise ? To force my hand like that ?
dale_horvath I saved your life .

andrea_harrison No , Dale . I saved yours . You forced that on me . I did n't want your blood on my hands and that is the only reason I left that building . What did you expect ? What , I 'd have some kind of epiphany ? Some life - affirming catharsis ?
dale_horvath Maybe just a little gratitude .
andrea_harrison Gratitude ? I wanted to die my way , not torn apart by drooling freaks . That was my choice . You took that away from me , dale .
dale_horvath But-- .

andrea_harrison But you know better ? All I wanted after my sister died was to get out of this endless horrific nightmare we live every day . I was n't hurting anyone else . You took my choice away , Dale . And you expect gratitude ?
dale_horvath I do n't know what to say .
andrea_harrison I 'm not your little girl . I 'm not your wife . And I am sure as hell not your problem . That 's all there is to say .
carl_grimes Shane , look . Dad said I could carry it and mom said as long as I was-- .
shane_walsh Keep it down . We 're looking for Sophia . You need to focus on the task .
lori_grimes Got to keep up .
carl_grimes I am .
lori_grimes You okay ?
carl_grimes I think Shane 's mad at me . Did I do something wrong ?
lori_grimes No . No , honey , I promise you . He 's just -- he 's worried about Sophia , that 's all . Come on .
shane_walsh She could be in there .
daryl_dixon Could be a whole bunch of things in there .
rick_grimes Carol . Call out softly . If she 's in there , yours is the first voice she should hear .
carol_peletier Sophia , sweetie , are you in there ? Sophia , it 's mommy . Sophia . We 're all here , baby . It 's mommy .
carol_peletier Daryl ? Daryl ?
daryl_dixon It ai n't her .
carol_peletier What 's in there ?
daryl_dixon Some guy . Did what Jenner said opted out . Ai n't that what he called it ?
shane_walsh What direction ?
rick_grimes I think that way . I 'm pretty sure .
shane_walsh Damn , it 's hard to tell out here .
carol_peletier If we heard them , maybe sophia did too .
glenn_rhee Someone 's ringing those bells , maybe calling others .
andrea_harrison Or signaling they found her .
rick_grimes She could be ringing them herself . Come on .
theodore_douglas Ai n't you supposed to be fixing that radiator ? What if they come back with Sophia . And rick wants to move on right away ?
dale_horvath I had it fixed yesterday .
theodore_douglas What ? What was all that rubbing and sanding for then ? That 's just bullshit .
dale_horvath Yeah , that 's one word . Another word would be pantomime -- just for show . No one else needs to know that .
theodore_douglas Pantomime .
dale_horvath If the others know we 're mobile , they 'll want to mobilize and move on .
theodore_douglas So you do n't think they 're gon na find Sophia , that it ?

dale_horvath I 'm just guarding against the worst . Sooner or later , if she 's not found , people will start doing the math . I want to hold off the needs - of - the many - versus - the - needs - of - the - few arguments as long as I can .
theodore_douglas That is one tricky hose , huh ?
dale_horvath Very .
shane_walsh That ca n't be it . Got no steeple , no bells . rick .
rick_grimes Sophia !
daryl_dixon Yo , J. C , you taking requests ?
shane_walsh I 'm telling you , it 's the wrong church . It 's got no steeple , Rick . There 's no steeple .
daryl_dixon A timer . It 's on a timer .
carol_peletier I 'm gon na go back in for a bit .
lori_grimes Are you really leaving ?
shane_walsh Do n't you think it 's best for all of us ?
lori_grimes I think it is . What made you decide ?

shane_walsh Got ta back away . Just trying to be the good guy here , Lori , even if you do n't see it . None of this was intended . I hope you know that . Well , do n't matter . As long as I said it .
lori_grimes You 're just gon na disappear ? You 're not even gon na tell Rick ?
shane_walsh He 'd only try to stop me . No , that 's on you . You tell him what you want . Or tell him nothing at all . You 're his wife .
lori_grimes And Carl ? We dragged him into this .
shane_walsh I love carl .
lori_grimes He thinks you hate you .
shane_walsh I 'm trying to put some distance . I 'm trying to make this easier . This ai n't easy on any of us , least of all me . I 'm the one who loses you .

carol_peletier Father , forgive me . I do n't deserve your mercy . I prayed for safe passage from Atlanta and you provided . I prayed for Ed to be punished for laying his hands on me and for looking at his own daughter with whatever sickness was growing in his soul . I prayed you 'd put a stop to it , give me a chance to raise her right , help her not make my mistakes . She 's so fearful . She 's so young in her way . She has n't had a chance . Praying for Ed 's death was a sin . Please , do n't let this be my punishment . Let her be safe , alive and safe . Please , lord . Punish me however you want , but show mercy on her .
andrea_harrison I 'm coming with you .
shane_walsh I do n't know what the hell you 're talking about .
andrea_harrison I 'm not stupid and I 'm certainty not deaf . Look , I do n't know the story .
shane_walsh There is no story .
andrea_harrison Fine , I do n't care . Do n't confuse me with someone who does . Look , all I care about is getting out of here . As far away as I can , like you .
shane_walsh We 're gon na sail off into the sunset together ? We gon na hold hands ?

andrea_harrison I 'm not asking you to go steady , Shane . I 'm asking for a ride , a chance to start over somewhere else . You observe this group lately ? I have . I see two people who do n't belong . We 're the odd men out . Between the two of us , we make a great third wheel .
shane_walsh So what ? Say we do , we just run off . What 's in it for me except for the extra ass I got to cover ?
andrea_harrison The chance to do something for someone else .
shane_walsh Yeah .
andrea_harrison And a door that swings both ways . Put a gun in my hand , I 'll cover your ass too .
andrea_harrison Think it over .
shane_walsh Got to move here , man . These people are spent . There 's only so many hours of daylight left . We still got a long way back .
rick_grimes I ca n't stop yet .
shane_walsh We still got a lot of ground to cover , whole other side of the creek bed . So we search that on the way back .
rick_grimes She would have heard those church bells . She could be nearby .
shane_walsh She could be a lot of things .
rick_grimes I ca n't go back . Her being out here is my fault .
shane_walsh That 's great . Now they got you doubting yourself , huh ?
rick_grimes What about you ? You doubt me ?
shane_walsh Hey , we can assign all kinds of blame .
rick_grimes This means something , finding her .
shane_walsh Oh man .
rick_grimes It would be the miracle we need . We ca n't give up .

shane_walsh Mmm . Ahem . Y'all gon na follow the creek bed back , okay ? Daryl , you 're in charge . Me and Rick , we 're just gon na hang back , search this area another hour or so just to be through .
daryl_dixon You 're splitting us up . You sure ?
shane_walsh Yeah , we 'll catch up to you .
carl_grimes I want to stay too . We 're her friends .
lori_grimes Just be careful , okay ?
carl_grimes I will .
lori_grimes When did you start growing up ?
rick_grimes I 'll be along soon enough . Here , take this . Remember how to use it ?
lori_grimes I 'm not taking your gun and leaving you unharmed .
daryl_dixon Here , got a spare . Take it .
rick_grimes Give me a minute ?
shane_walsh Yeah . Come on .
rick_grimes I do n't know if you 're looking at me with what ?
rick_grimes Sadness ? Scorn ? Pity ? Love ?

rick_grimes Maybe it 's just indifference . I guess you already know I 'm not much of a believer . I guess I just chose to put my faith elsewhere . My family , mostly . My friends . My job . The thing is , we -- I could use a little something to help keep us going . Some kind of . acknowledgement . Some indication I 'm doing the right thing . You do n't know how hard that is to know . Well , maybe you do . Hey look , I do n't need all the answers . Just a little nudge . A sign . Any sign will do .
shane_walsh Get what you needed ?
rick_grimes Guess I 'll find out .
carol_peletier So this is it ? This the whole plan ?
daryl_dixon I guess the plan is to whittle us down into smaller and smaller groups .
andrea_harrison Carrying knives and pointy sticks . I see you have a gun .

lori_grimes Why , you want it ? Here , take it . I 'm sick of the looks you 're giving me all of you . Honey , I ca n't imagine what you 're going through . And I would do anything to stop it . But you have got to stop blaming Rick . It is in your face every time you look at him . When sophia ran he did n't hesitate , did he ? Not for a second . I do n't know that any of us would have gone after her the way he did or made the hard decisions that he had to make or that anybody could have done it any differently . Anybody ? Y'all look to him and then you blame him when he 's not perfect . If you think you can do this without him , go right ahead . Nobody is stopping you .
andrea_harrison We should keep moving .
rick_grimes shane .
rick_grimes Oh no . No . No no no no !
